Running Python code interactively: import cv2
from pyzbar.pyzbar import decode

# Read the image
image = cv2.imread('/workspace/qrcode.png')

# Decode QR code
decoded_objects = decode(image)

# Print results
for obj in decoded_objects:
    print("Type:", obj.type)
    print("Data:", obj.data.decode('utf-8'))
